ABOUT

Freelance Web Developer. Hip Hop Fan. Hobby Fantasy Map Artist.

Always passionate with the work, be it as a hobby or professional. Love to solve problems and creating intuitive and efficient products, while all the time listening to Nas, Big Pun or KRS-One.
When having freetime, I love spending time with family and friends or draw fantasy maps, as I love to create worlds, just as I did when I started programming over ten years ago with a book about C++ Game Development.
